name: Holes & Balls
description:
Drag the ball!!! Release it to shoot... and put the ball in the right hole!

"Holes & Balls" is a unique game where you throw the ball to the right tonal hole!
By the way...don´t forget to collect the Extra Time!
And use the walls to reach more Points!

So...who long did you make it?!

Have many fun with our App...
dapion.de
